meta.title: From GOLDEN to EAR
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: We're celebrating the upcoming season of "[Make Some  Noise](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKBcWn-tqWE)," which premieres on Monday, October 13. The Golden Ear is the prize awarded to the best improviser on the show, though the method for calculating scores is, let's say, at best, opaque.

ladder.transform: idol took the form of a

ladder.clue: Add a letter to <> to get a toy brand
Change one letter in <> to get an animal (some of whom are "employed" for <> control)
Insert a letter in <> to get a part of some credits
What has been <>, in a phrase attributed to Caesar
Drop the first and last letters of <> to get a body part
